entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 02 January 2023
